thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com
thread.title: OM

author: OM
title: OM
text:
Are they perfect? No. Do I once in a while have a less than stellar time on the phone with them and in their apps/websites? Yes.
Are they just as responsive as any business larger than 1 person can be expected to be? Yes.
Do they give you tons of advice, unique to each expert you talk to, so you see different opinions and ways of looking at technology and art? Yes.
Simply put, they're the best.
